net.sf.wubiq.print.managers

Interface IDirectConnectPrintJobManager

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IRemotePrintJobManager

    public interface IDirectConnectPrintJobManager
extends IRemotePrintJobManager
    Represents the contract for the Direct connection Management
    Author:
    Federico Alcantara

    • Method Detail

      • directConnector

        IDirectConnectorQueue directConnector(java.lang.String queueId)
        Finds the associated direct connector queue handler.
        Parameters:
        queueId - Id of the queue to find.
        Returns:
        DirectConnectorQueue found or newly created. Must never be null.

      • isPrinting

      • isDirectConnect

        Returns current direct connect state.
        Parameters:
        jobId - id of the job.
        Returns:
        State of direct connection.

      • hasLocalPrintJob

        boolean hasLocalPrintJob(java.lang.Long jobId)
        Checks if the manager has a local (in memory) copy of the print job in one of its queue.
        Parameters:
        jobId - Job Id to check.
        Returns:
        true if the manager has a local copy.
